snippet: President Obama’s three predecessors signed an increase in the federal minimum wage by forging agreement with a Congress controlled by the opposing party.
abstract: Political Memo; Pres Obama’s three predecessors signed increase in federal minimum wage by forging agreement with a Congress controlled by opposing party; indispensable ingredient that Obama so far lacks in accomplishing feat is Republican leader strongly motivated to make deal over party's philosophical objections.
lead_paragraph: President Obama’s three predecessors signed an increase in the federal minimum wage by forging agreement with a Congress controlled by the opposing party.

headline.main: Missing Ingredient on Minimum Wage: A Motivated G.O.P.
headline.print_headline: Missing Ingredient on Minimum Wage: A Motivated G.O.P.
